original:
§oCovers are ways to give your machines extra behavior without using any extra block space.§r

Covers are placed by right-clicking with it on a face of a machine, and removed with a (or by mining the machine, but that's too brutal!).

Pretty much any GregTech machines will accept Covers, even if they provide no functionality.

Opening a Cover is done by right-click with a , or shift-right-click on another face using the grid.

Placing a cover of a lower voltage tier on a machine is §9safe§r.
translation:
§o覆盖板可以为您的机器提供额外功能，并且不占用额外空间。§r

在机器的某个面上使用覆盖板右键单击来放置它，使用移除(或者直接把机器挖掉，但这太残暴了！)。

几乎所有格雷科技机器都可以接受覆盖板，即使它们不提供任何功能。

使用右键单击可以打开覆盖板GUI，或者shift+右键单击另一面的九宫格也行。

在机器上安装较低电压的覆盖板是§9安全§r的。

original: A simple example of a pump cover.
Here is a <lang key="block.gtceu.lv_super_tank"/> with <style color="#FF431A">lava</style>.
translation: 这是一个装有<style color="#FF431A">熔岩</style>的<lang key="block.gtceu.lv_super_tank"/>。

original: Cover can be placed by right-clicking the corresponding face of the machine with the hand-held pump.
translation: 手持泵右键单击机器的相应面即可把它作为覆盖板放置。

original: <style color="#FF431A">Lava</style> is pumped to the above tank.
translation: <style color="#FF431A">熔岩</style>被泵送到上面的储罐中。

original: The cover can also be placed on the pipe.
translation: 覆盖板也可以放置在管道上。

original: A screwdriver right-clicking the cover to open its configurator ui.
translation: 使用螺丝刀右键单击覆盖板以打开其设置界面。

original: A crowbar right-clicking the face of cover to remove it.
translation: 使用撬棍右键单击覆盖板的表面即可取下。

original: Covers are ways to give your machines extra behavior without using any extra block space.
translation: 覆盖板可以为您的机器提供额外功能，并且不占用额外空间。

original:
On the non-automatic output side, you can also actively output without relying on pipes.
You can use a to output internal fluid to adjacent tank. Yes, the is not only an important crafting material, but also a kind of useful cover.
translation:
对于无法自动输出的面，你也可以让它不借助管道主动输出。
你可以用 将机器内部的流体输出到相邻的储罐。 没错， 不仅只是重要的合成组件，也是一种有用的覆盖板。

original: The default mode of the pump cover is output. To adjust its configuration, you need a <style color="0xffafff00" underlined="true" link="gtceu:tools/screwdriver" hover-info="click link">screwdriver</style>.
translation: 电动泵覆盖板的默认模式是输出。你需要<style color="0xffafff00" underlined="true" link="gtceu:tools/screwdriver" hover-info="click link">螺丝刀</style>来调整它的配置。

original: To remove a placed cover from machines and pipes, you need a <style color="0xffafff00" underlined="true" link="gtceu:tools/crowbar" hover-info="click link">crowbar</style>.
translation: 你需要<style color="0xffafff00" underlined="true" link="gtceu:tools/crowbar" hover-info="click link">撬棍</style>来移除机器和管道上放置的覆盖板。
